# rartenfinder

R Client for the artenfinder API (http://artenfinder.rlp.de)


## Installation

### Development version from GitHub

```{r eval=FALSE}
install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("EDiLD/rartenfinder")
```

```{r}
library('rartenfinder')
library('dplyr')
```

## Usage

### Query metadata

#### Available taxagroups

```{r taxagroups}
get_taxagroups() %>%
  head()
```

#### Available taxa

List all available taxa
```{r}
get_taxa() %>%
  head() %>%
  select(-eu_guid, gid)
```

Query taxa by regex:
```{r}
get_taxa(name_regexp_ci = '^Udea.*$') %>%
  head() %>%
  select(-eu_guid, gid)
```


Query taxa by group
```{r}
get_taxa(taxagroup = 'Flechten') %>%
  head() %>%
  select(-eu_guid, gid)
```
